metadata.synopsis: The spirit of the amulet comments on the shadow-cursed town's hospital, and the Sharran hospital stuff that aren't shy of torture and mutilation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MonkAmulet_Get" and equip the amulet.- Go to the TWN hospital at S_TWN_MonkAmulet_HospitalBanter_Trigger_1d2c7a81-a1c3-47f8-b4ff-266ebfb3a70a- Resolve the Surgeon situation or kill the surgeon and his nurses

0.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
0.text: Ho ho, that unmistakable Sharran spirit. Ever so eager to stab, prod, and finger.

1.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
1.text: Hehehehe - a horrific display. There is no red deeper than a Sharran's blood.
